text: Ezɨ Herodias nɨghnɨziba uan guivim ganɨngi, ezɨ guivim ghua kamaghɨn Herot mɨgei, “Nɨ Jon, Gumaziba Ruer Gumazimɨn dapanim isɨva itaritam dafagh a inigh izɨ na danɨngigh.”(14:8) Herodias uan guivim ko, aning deraghvɨra foghasa, Jon guizbangɨra areme, kamaghɨn amizɨ aning ghaze, nɨ an dapanim isɨva itarim datɨgh a inigh izɨ ga danɨngigh.
